sentences.sContent: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.sCn: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.sContent: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.sCn: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.sContent: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.sCn: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.sContent: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.sCn: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.sContent: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.sCn: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.sContent: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.sCn: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.sContent: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.sCn: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.sContent: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.sCn: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。
